Package ants

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AntGameMapCallback
    This interface provides a method that can be called by a game object to move itself on the game map.
    AntGameMapView
    This interface provides a method that can be called to view the game objects of the map.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ant
    This class represents an ant in the game of ants.
    AntBotGameInfo
    This class holds informations about the ant game a bot is currently playing.
    AntFakeCommunicator
    This class represents a fake communicator that aims to play with a bot in training mode.
    AntFoodSpawn
    This class represents a game object that generates food on the map that can be harvested by ants.
    AntGame
    This class represents an ant game being played.
    AntGameManager
    This class is responsible for creating ant games when appropriated.
    AntGameMap
    This class represents the dynamic game map of an ant game.
    AntGameMapMask
    This class represents a mask or a pattern that can be applied an a board map to select specific cells of the game map.
    AntGameObject
    Represents a game object specific to the game of ants.
    AntGameReplayData
    This class stores the evolution of the state of an ant game.
    AntGameServer
    This class implements a game server specific to the game of ants.
    AntHill
    This class represents an ant hill where ants can spawn from.
    AntMapTemplate
    The AntMapTemplate class represents a template of an ant game map.
    AntWall
    A wall is an unmovable, unpierceable game object placed on the map.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMapFormatException
    This class represents the exception for an invalid map format.
